Instruction: I want to select all rows in my dataframe where column A values are greater than 2

Function.name: DataFrame.query
Function.description: Query the columns of a DataFrame with a boolean expression.

optional.name: inplace
optional.description: Whether to modify the DataFrame rather than creating a new one.

optional.name: **kwargs
optional.description:
See the documentation for eval() for complete details
on the keyword arguments accepted by DataFrame.query().
